section.p: The amount that was or is to be supplied
"A dimensioned quantity expressing the result of measuring" - HL7 V3

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type Real
The magnitude of the quantity measured in terms of the unit.
"The magnitude of the quantity measured in terms of the unit" - HL7 V3

Contains exactly one [1..1] unit with data type Code
The unit of measure specified in the Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) [].
"The unit of measure specified in the Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM). The default unit is 1." - HL7 V3

Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type Real
The magnitude of the quantity measured in terms of the unit.
"The magnitude of the quantity measured in terms of the unit" - HL7 V3

Contains exactly one [1..1] unit with data type Code
The unit of measure specified in the Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) [].
"The unit of measure specified in the Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM). The default unit is 1." - HL7 V3
